TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlWriterTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 将跟踪或调试输出作为 XML 编码的数据定向到 或 （如 ）。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output as XML-encoded data to a or to a , such as a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 你必须具有非托管代码权限来创建的实例类。You must have unmanaged code permission to create an instance of the class. 类将跟踪和调试信息的 XML 编码的文本流转换的转换。The class converts tracing and debugging information into an XML-encoded text stream. 请按照表中显示了 XML 输出的说明。The description of the XML output is shown in the tables that follow. 你可以使用[服务跟踪查看器工具 (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129)来显示 XML 输出。You can use the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) to display the XML output. 你可以启用或禁用通过应用程序配置文件，然后使用已配置的应用程序中。You can enable or disable an through the application configuration file and then use the configured in your application. 或者，你可以创建在代码中。Alternately, you can create an in your code. 若要配置，编辑配置文件对应于你的应用程序的名称。To configure an , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加或删除侦听器、 侦听器设置的属性或删除侦听器。In this file, you can add or remove a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove listeners. 配置文件应类似下面的示例格式化。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. ```xml ``` 类继承从基类的属性。The class inherits the property from the base class . 属性允许的额外级别的筛选在侦听器的跟踪输出。The property allows an additional level of trace output filtering at the listener. 如果没有筛选器，`Trace`方法的跟踪侦听器调用筛选器来确定是否发出跟踪的方法。If there is a filter present, the `Trace` methods of the trace listener call the method of the filter to determine whether to emit the trace. > [!NOTE] > 如果尝试写入到正在使用的文件或不可用，文件名自动的前缀的 guid。If an attempt is made to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID. > [!NOTE] > 侦听器方法旨在由方法的调用， ，和类。Listener methods are intended to be called by methods of the , , and classes. 侦听器方法不应直接从应用程序代码中调用。The listener methods are not intended to be called directly from application code. 侦听器主要适用于使用类。The listener is primarily intended for use by the class. 和方法可以调用的和类和默认值提供的 XML 元素，和不提供的值。The and methods can be called by the and classes, and default values are provided for the XML elements that and do not supply values for. 下表描述的元素和特性的 XML 输出。The following table describes the elements and attributes of the XML output. |元素Element|特性Attributes|输出Output|说明Notes| |-------------|----------------|------------|-----------| |`CallStack`|无None|取决于是否存在的中标记出来属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|特殊字符如 > 或 < 替换为转义序列。Special characters such as > or < are replaced with escape sequences. 请参阅后面的转义的字符转换表。See the escaped character translation table that follows.| |`Computer`|无None|始终存在。Always present.| 属性的值。The value of the property.| |`Correlation`|`ActivityID`|始终存在Always present|如果未指定，默认值为一个空 GUID。If not specified, the default is an empty GUID.| ||`RelatedActivityID`|取决于是否存在的`relatedActivityId`跟踪方法调用中的参数。Depends on the presence of the `relatedActivityId` parameter in the Trace method call.| 方法的 `relatedActivityId` 参数。The `relatedActivityId` parameter of the method.| |`DataItem`|无None|依赖于`data`参数方法。Depends on the `data` parameter of the method.|此元素可以包含元素或一个元素的数组，因此，值编写为一组`DataItem`下的子节点`TraceData`元素。This element can contain an array of elements or one element, so the values are written as a set of `DataItem` nodes under the `TraceData` element.

数据输出使用`ToString`传入的数据对象的方法。The data output uses the `ToString` method of the passed-in data objects.| |`EventID`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入 (`id`)。Parameter input (`id`).| |`Execution`|`ProcessName`|始终存在。Always present.|从。From the .| ||`ProcessID`|始终存在。Always present.|从。From the . 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 操作系统上，如果`ProcessID`大于的 2147483647 它是负数正数表示形式，因此应转换若要获取正确的进程标识符。On Windows 98 and Windows Me operating systems, if `ProcessID` is greater than 2,147,483,647 it is a positive representation of a negative number and should be converted to obtain the correct process identifier.| ||`ThreadID`|始终存在。Always present.|从。From the .| |`Level`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|参数输入 (的数值`eventType`)。Parameter input (the numeric value of `eventType`). 参数值大于 255 是 255 的输出。Parameter values greater than 255 are output as 255.| |`LogicalOperationStack`|无None|取决于是否存在的中标记出来属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|可能有多个逻辑运算，因此值编写为`LogicalOperation`下的子节点`LogicalOperationStack`元素。There can be more than one logical operation, so the values are written as `LogicalOperation` nodes under the `LogicalOperationStack` element.| |`Message`|无None|取决于在跟踪方法调用中的消息存在。Depends on the presence of a message in the Trace method call.|如果提供了格式设置的参数，则此元素是格式的消息。This element is a formatted message if formatting arguments are provided.| |`Source`|`Name`|始终存在。Always present.|输入的参数。Parameter input.| |`SubType`|`Name`|始终存在。Always present.|输入的参数。Parameter input.| |`TimeCreated`|`SystemTime`|始终存在。Always present.|如果不存在于，默认值是当前时间。If not present in the , the default is the current time.| |`TimeStamp`|无None|取决于是否存在的中标记出来属性。Depends on the presence of the flag in the property.|从。From the .| |`Type`|无None|始终存在。Always present.|值始终为 3。Always the value 3.| 下表显示了 XML 输出中转义的字符。The following table shows the characters that are escaped in the XML output. 转义发生中的所有元素和属性除外`DataItem`元素，它不转译，如果该对象传递给`data`参数方法是对象。Escaping occurs in all the elements and attributes with the exception of the `DataItem` element, which is not escaped if the object passed to the `data` parameter of the method is an object. 如果用于数据对象，调用方法和作为非转义数据跟踪整个根节点。If an is used for the data object, the method is called and the entire root node is traced as unescaped data. |转义字符Escaped character|“值”Value| |-----------------------|-----------| |&|&| |\<|<| |>|>| |""|"| |\|'| |0xD0xD|&\#xD;&\#xD;| |0xA0xA|&\#xA;&\#xA;| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用类转义和非转义数据写入文件日志。The following code example shows the use of the class to write both escaped and non-escaped data to file logs. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener/VB/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化的新实例类指定的文件，指定路径上使用编码。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果该文件存在，则会附加到。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果文件不存在，则创建一个新文件。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要减少可能出现异常，可能会导致输出无效的任何字符均替换"？"字符。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 属性初始化为空字符串 ("")。The property is initialized to an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性`name`参数值或为空字符串 ("") 如果`name`参数是`null`。This constructor initializes the property to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 名称可以用作到索引要以编程方式更改侦听器的属性集合。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下面的代码设置的实例的属性其属性是"xmlListener"。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化的新实例类指定的文件，指定路径上使用编码。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果该文件存在，则会附加到。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果文件不存在，则创建一个新文件。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要减少可能出现异常，可能会导致输出无效的任何字符均替换"？"字符。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 属性设置为`name`参数值或为空字符串 ("") 如果`name`参数是`null`。The property is set to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 名称可以用作到索引要以编程方式更改侦听器的属性集合。The name can be used as an index into the collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下面的代码设置的实例的属性其属性是"xmlListener"。For example, the following code sets the property for an instance of whose property is "xmlListener". ``` ((XmlWriterTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["xmlListener"]).TraceOutputOptions = TraceOptions.Timestamp. ```

summary.span: 关闭该侦听器的 ，以使其不再接收跟踪或调试输出。

span.span: Closes the for this listener so that it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.

summary.span: 将包含错误信息和详细错误信息的跟踪信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information including an error message and a detailed error message to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认行为是在用户界面模式下，并对其运行该应用程序时显示消息框中的消息和详细的消息实例集合。The default behavior is to display the message and detailed message in a message box when the application is running in user-interface mode, and to the instances in the collection. 默认情况下，集合包含的实例。By default, the collection contains an instance of . 您可以通过添加或删除自定义此行为从集合。You can customize this behavior by adding or removing a from the collection.

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file or stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, object data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object data) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceData (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, data As Object)
public: override void TraceData(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::Object ^ data);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A data object to emit.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`页眉和页脚的跟踪中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`参数被转换为无符号整数，然后编写本文时，因此一个负数`id`作为较大的正整数写入值。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `data`参数写作`DataItem`中的节点`TraceData`元素。The `data` parameter is written as a `DataItem` node in the `TraceData` element. `ToString`数据对象方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应直接由应用程序代码调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 方法的调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

permission.span: 表示调用非托管的代码的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 关联枚举：。

span.span: Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, params object[] data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object[] data) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceData (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, ParamArray data As Object())

public: override void TraceData(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, ... cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ data);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 要发出的数据对象的数组。

span.span: An array of data objects to emit.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, data objects, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`页眉和页脚的跟踪中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`参数被转换为无符号整数，然后编写本文时，因此一个负数`id`作为较大的正整数写入值。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 中的对象`data`参数数组都被编写为`DataItem`中的节点`TraceData`元素。The objects in the `data` parameter array are written as `DataItem` nodes in the `TraceData` element. `ToString`的每个数据对象的方法用于将对象转换为字符串。The `ToString` method of each data object is used to convert the object to a string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应直接由应用程序代码调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 方法的调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、消息和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`页眉和页脚的跟踪中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`参数被转换为无符号整数，然后编写本文时，因此一个负数`id`作为较大的正整数写入值。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`参数写作`Message`元素。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应直接由应用程序代码调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 方法的调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

permission.span: 表示调用非托管的代码的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 关联枚举：。

span.span: Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceEvent (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, string format, params object[] args);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceEvent(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, string format, object[] args) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceEvent (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, format As String, ParamArray args As Object())

public: override void TraceEvent(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::String ^ format, ... cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ args);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
One of the values.
A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: format
param.span: 包含零个或多个格式项的格式字符串，这些项与 args 数组中的对象相对应。

span.span: A format string that contains zero or more format items that correspond to objects in the args array.

param.name: args
param.span: 包含零个或多个要格式化的对象的对象数组。

span.span: An object array containing zero or more objects to format.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、格式化消息和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`页眉和页脚的跟踪中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`参数被转换为无符号整数，然后编写本文时，因此一个负数`id`作为较大的正整数写入值。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. 调用方法时，传入`format`字符串和`args`作为参数，若要设置格式的数组`args`对象数组作为`Message`元素。The method is called, passing in the `format` string and `args` array as parameters, to format the `args` object array as the `Message` element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此方法不应直接由应用程序代码调用。This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. 方法的调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

permission.span: 表示调用非托管的代码的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 关联枚举：。

span.span: Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceTransfer (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, int id, string message, Guid relatedActivityId);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceTransfer(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, int32 id, string message, valuetype System.Guid relatedActivityId) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceTransfer (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, id As Integer, message As String, relatedActivityId As Guid)
public: override void TraceTransfer(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, int id, System::String ^ message, Guid relatedActivityId);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
The source name.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A trace message to write.

param.name: relatedActivityId
param.span: 标识相关活动的 结构。

span.span: A structure that identifies a related activity.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息（包括相关活动的标识）、消息和事件信息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法适用于的相关的跟踪相关性。The method is used for the correlation of related traces. `eventCache`， `source`， `id`，和`relatedActivityId`页眉和页脚的跟踪中使用参数。The `eventCache`, `source`, `id`, and `relatedActivityId` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace. `id`参数被转换为无符号整数，然后编写本文时，因此一个负数`id`作为较大的正整数写入值。The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer. `message`参数写作`Message`元素。The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element. 调用方法来转换`relatedActivityId`值为"B"格式字符串，它显示在标头。The method is called to convert the `relatedActivityId`value to a "B" formatted string, which appears in the header. `SubTypeName`页脚中的元素标识与跟踪事件类型。The `SubTypeName` element in the footer identifies the trace event type as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它旨在由调用对象发出的跟踪信息其方法。It is intended to be called by a object to emit the trace information for its method.

permission.span: 表示调用非托管的代码的能力。

span.span: for the ability to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 关联枚举：。

span.span: Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Write (string message);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(string message) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Write (message As String)
public: override void Write(System::String ^ message);

span.span: The message to write.

summary.span: 将不包含任何其他上下文信息的原义消息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法中的日志输出包含上下文信息。Use the method to include context information in the log output.

permission.span: 表示调用非托管的代码的能力。

MemberSignature.Value: public override void WriteLine (string message);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteLine(string message) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteLine (message As String)
public: override void WriteLine(System::String ^ message);

span.span: The message to write.

summary.span: 将不包含任何其他上下文信息且后跟当前行结束符的原义消息写入文件或流中。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information followed by the current line terminator to the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法中的日志输出包含上下文信息。Use the method to include context information in the log output.
